name: Arcese Trasporti S.p.A
goal: The Arcese Group can count on a solid network, a property owned fleet of 800 trucks, 2,800 trailers and more than 500,000 sqm of warehouses, which makes it one of the largest private logistics operators in Italy and Europe. Annually, it carries out about 150,000 FTL shipments and moves about three million tonnes of goods on the road across the whole of Europe. The supply chain management of such huge quantities of transport can only be achieved with suppliersâ€™ help. Therefore, ARC has subcontracted 35% of the road transportation to about 1.000 suppliers. The challenge is the planning of this network, requires legal contracts and dedicated resources with the support of several IT and multimedia means.
